greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = n if n is not divisible by 4, otherwise 0.
reference: J. M. Borwein, D. H. Bailey and R. Girgensohn, Experimentation in Mathematics, A K Peters, Ltd., Natick, MA, 2004. x+357 pp. See p. 195.
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,0,2,0,0,0,-1)
formula: a(n) = n * A166486(n) = n * signum(n mod 4).
program: (MAGMA) [n mod 4 ne 0 select n else 0:n in [0..86]]; // _Marius A. Burtea_, Jan 13 2020
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 14 2011
